content2: Yala National Park is one of the most popular and well-known wildlife reserves in Sri Lanka. It is located in the southeast part of the country. The park is renowned for its diverse range of wildlife, including leopards. Yala has one of the highest leopard densities in the world. Visitors to Yala National Park have a good chance of spotting leopards, especially during the early morning or late afternoon safari drives.
